answers.answer: HI,I am sorry about this new diagnosis of lymphoma/leukemia.  I am fairly certain  that this is not linked to his neuropathy or his diabetes at all.Be sure that your husband is followed closely during his treatments, in regard to both his cancer and his diabetes.Best of luck to you both and take care.

question: my husband is a severe diabetic with nueropathy  , he just had a biopsy on a lympnode in his grion areait came back lymphomia/luekiamia,  been then after he had the bonemarrow,,the doctor diagnosed him with radio active lympnodes,, is this linked to his nueropathy
title: diabeties
